game.name: Two Worlds II HD
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Check out the new Velvet Edition bundle including both Two Worlds II and Pirates of the Flying Fortress DLC.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Check out the new Velvet Edition bundle including both Two Worlds II and Pirates of the Flying Fortress DLC.

reviewHighlights.text: It has that 'euro-jank' charm that I love. It's not perfectly polished like a Bethesda game, but it has more character and weirdness.‚Äç
Glitchy, janky, mess... It feels SO incomplete and untested. But, I kept coming back to it. I found myself actually looking forward to jumping back in...
